description: I'm a full-stack developer with 12 years of experience solving complex problems for companies and entities as large as Nordstrom and the U.S. State Department, to just-launched start-ups.

detailOrQuote: I specialize in devising custom, cost-effective high-performance, scalable solutions to the many of the toughest problems big and small businesses alike face.
